text: Pedro Miguel Neves Santos (born 24 March 1994) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for U.D. Vilafranquense as a midfielder. ==Football career== He made his Taça da Liga debut for Vilafranquense on 28 July 2019 in a game against Casa Pia. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:LigaPro players Category:Campeonato de Portugal (league) players Category:U.D. title: Pepo Santos
